entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening and ending before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023
